sentences.en: After a Giants game last May in San Francisco , the couple dined with Giants COO Larry Baer.
sentences.cn: 5月, 这对情侣看完巨人队的比赛后和巨人队主力拉里·巴尔一起进餐.

sentences.en: Appoint Chen Danian to be official of company presiding operation grandly ( COO ).
sentences.cn: 盛大任命陈大年为公司首席运营官 ( COO ).

sentences.en: CEO, CFO, COO, SVP Marketing, and head of R & D if it is appropriate.
sentences.cn: CEO, CFO, COO, SVP市场营销, 和R & D领导者,是否人当其职.

sentences.en: Every cry or coo was a small glimpse into my son's mind.
sentences.cn: 每一句对儿子的大声呼喊或低声细语都是在向他灌输说话的概念.

sentences.en: He must quit himself before Mk. Coo dismissed him.
sentences.cn: 他不能等曹先生辞他,只好自己先滚吧!

sentences.en: Let's leave the two young people to bill and coo together.
sentences.cn: 咱们让这对年轻人单独在一起谈情说爱去吧.

sentences.en: Mr. Coo and Mrs. Coo went to bed.
Prince and Willumstad became CEO and COO, respectively, in 2003.
sentences.cn: 平思和威尔姆斯达在2003年分别担任行政总裁和首席执行官.

sentences.en: She paused to coo at the baby.
sentences.cn: 她停下来，轻声地对着婴儿说话。

sentences.en: The electrode added with acetylene black shows the highest specific capacity and the lowest capacity density.
sentences.cn: 就体积比容量而言,CoO作添加剂的负极最高,而乙炔黑作添加剂的最低.造成上述结果的原因在于它们的导电性、电催化特性以及松装密度的差异.

sentences.en: Tianji's founder Derek Ling and tianji COO Mr. Feifan received Knighthood at the same party.
sentences.cn: 在聚会中,天际网总裁林峰和行政总监张非凡一起得到爵位称号.

sentences.en: Trust, needless to say, is vital and mentioned by almost every COO interviewed here.
sentences.cn: 不用说, 信任是至关重要的,书中采访的所有首席运营官几乎都提到了这点.

words.tran_cn: 喔啊声；轻柔低语；鸽子咕咕叫
鸽子咕咕叫；温声细语（coo的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: （鸽）咕咕地叫，低声软语地说，温柔亲切地说
（鸽）咕咕地叫，温柔可爱地说话
trans.tran_en: to make soft quiet sounds, or to speak in a soft quiet way
